@uelveelze Yes, your point is? For what I read is "being taken away". But they are not going out, nor they have an implicit relationship to be taken away, which is what the NTR alludes to. They never took the childhood friend relationship away from her either. You could even argue that he wasn't taken away, but that she kicked him out via her actions. Actions speak way louder than words after all, as such, she did lose in the love race. And don't assume that I hate it, they can be fun stories in their own right too. I just dislike thins not being tagged properly, it can make it difficult to find something down the line.

No. Netorare is where the MC's partner cheat with someone else, netori is when the MC fvck someone's partner, and for this doujin it's reverse netorare where the MC cheat on her/his partner with someone but that someone hold the domination (or the MC is forced to)
